full_threads.body: @glen perfect thanks!

Hi Lucy, 

Confirming the Global Advisory Page was carried over to the other sites this morning:

https://acoufelt.com/us/about-us/global-advisory-board/
https://acoufelt.com/au/about-us/global-advisory-board/

https://acoufelt.com/us/about-us/global-advisory-board/
https://acoufelt.com/au/about-us/global-advisory-board/

here are the updated links @heath thanks

@glen they need to follow the same structure as the acoufelt.com site. 

That is

/au/about-us/global-advisory-board
/us/about-us/global-advisory-board

It's very important we keep these consistent across the 3 sites. 

You add the About Us page as a parent page to achieve this. Thanks

https://acoufelt.com/au/about-us/global-advisory-board
https://acoufelt.com/us/global-advisory-board/

@heath, here are the links
@glen great, thanks. Can you please add the links here so that I can share them directly with the clients.
hi @heath, im done importing the global advisory page to au and us sites. i've also put them in its menus. thanks
noted @heath

@glen can you please copy the Global Advisory Page over to both the /au and /us sites as well? Here is a how to video: https://www.loom.com/share/96292cee58904c8ebd663d81c28c3d8e

You can also add them to the main menu. Cheers

Please have this loaded to Aus and USA as well. Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Currently only Global. Please let us know if you would like it loaded up to US and AU as well?

Thanks for this

Is this uploaded on aus site only or both aus and USA?

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Sure, confirming this has now been updated: https://acoufelt.com/about-us/global-advisory-board/
HI @heath, Global Advisory Board has been added to the header menu. and I have also changed the image
hi @heath. i'll work on this minor changes now.

Thanks!

Looks good - although can we please change Michael's photo to the below:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/0we0xngar8mwmw0/Michael_NEALE_43_180814-5.jpg?dl=0

Otherwise good to go - can you please add this to the navigation page under 'Company' - call it 'Global Advisory Board'.

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Sure, confirming the below has been updated.
got it heath
@glen can you please action this one as a priority? Cheers

Hi there,

Could I please make some tweaks to this page:

  1. Change page title to 'Global Advisory Board' -

  1. The Global Advisory Board is comprised of a group of leaders across a multitude of fields, who underpin Acoufelt's commitment to innovation and thought leadership. The members of the board have been selected from diverse backgrounds and bring their expertise across the following disciplines:

  1. Mechanical engineering (Acoustics and vibration)
  2. Design and wellbeing
  3. Workplace and human factors
  4. Strategic business strategy and marketing


  1. Remove 'list item #1'



  1. Left align and change font of Colin Hansen's 'Advisory Board Member' title:



Thanks!

Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager


t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com
